reviewText: I recommend checking out this movie as it really surprised me. It's full of laughs and if you wanna be a pick up artist then take note of everything that's said. I've told all my friends about it and even my girl friends are into it. Cool stuff!

This movie is for anyone who wants to know how to attract girls! It's really funny, with Nathan Hill in fine form as a master pick-up artist who teaches you how to get all the girls you ever wanted, just like he does. I would think every guy would want to watch this movie with his buddies and find out how women tick and how to get them to do what you want. Highly recommended in you're in the mood for a good time and many laughs.
